attributes.action: Stop supply of weapons and technical aid to Saudi Arabia for the war in Yemen.
attributes.additional_details:
The "UK rules state that weapons should not be sold where there is a clear risk that they might be used in violation of international humanitarian law."
The funding for the humanitarian feeding programme has stopped.
The war in Yemen has left 13 million people on the brink of starvation.
attributes.background:
Promote  the humanitarian feeding programme internationally.
Adhere to the Court of Appeal ruling, June 2019:
“It should retake its previous decisions to allow weapons sales to Saudi Arabia.”
Withdraw its Supreme Court appeal against this judgement.
